types.html:
ne rien se refuser

  1. not to stint oneself, not to deny oneself anything
    On ne se refuse rien, à ce que je vois ! ― Well, it's all right for some! So, indulging yourself, I see!

See also

[edit]
  • ne pas se moucher du pied
  • se faire plaisir
trans: not to stint oneself, not to deny oneself anything
not to stint oneself, not to deny oneself anything
